### DATA-1
```{r}
#setwd(dirname(rstudioapi::getActiveDocumentContext()$path))
source("plot_missing.R")
nyc <- read.csv("NYPD_Arrests_Data__Historic_.csv", nrows = 100)
plot_missing(nyc, percent = TRUE)
```

Insightsï¼š
Here in our missing value plot, we can conclude that our data quality is good totally. KY_CD has largest missing proportion, which is around 25%.
